https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tOrCHtj4uUOt5p57F3SUwWbsQiE.jpg Diamonds are stolen only to be sold again in the international market. James Bond infiltrates a smuggling mission to find out who's guilty. The mission takes him to Las Vegas where Bond meets his archenemy Blofeld. Diamonds Are Forever
